channel.title: Comments on: (More Than) Full House for Web2Ireland DemoBar

item.title: By: Jude Murray
item.dc:creator: Jude Murray
item.description: We're really looking forward to attending and have duly noted to stop eating now! Mental note to self - think of something insightful to say for the podcast..
item.content:encoded: We’re really looking forward to attending and have duly noted to stop eating now! Mental note to self – think of something insightful to say for the podcast..

item.title: By: Stephen
item.dc:creator: Stephen
item.description:
No problem.
I always feel these kinds of Demo events could be recorded and put up somewhere a la TED or similar. It would be beneficial to the demoers (?), hosts, people who can't make it and future interested parties...
item.content:encoded:
No problem.

I always feel these kinds of Demo events could be recorded and put up somewhere a la TED or similar. It would be beneficial to the demoers (?), hosts, people who can’t make it and future interested parties…

item.title: By: Conor O'Neill
item.dc:creator: Conor O'Neill
item.description: Thanks Stephen but it's not really the kind of event for formal video. We may take a few quick snippets using cameraphones but that's it. The venue will also be completely jammed!
item.content:encoded: Thanks Stephen but it’s not really the kind of event for formal video. We may take a few quick snippets using cameraphones but that’s it. The venue will also be completely jammed!

item.title: By: Stephen
item.dc:creator: Stephen
item.description:
I may have a team interested in doing the videoing for you if you're interested?
They've done the AIM (aimawards.ie) before and have a fair amount of experience in web focussed video.
item.content:encoded:
I may have a team interested in doing the videoing for you if you’re interested?

They’ve done the AIM (aimawards.ie) before and have a fair amount of experience in web focussed video.

item.title: By: Conor O'Neill
item.dc:creator: Conor O'Neill
item.description: Oh, good question Stephen. If I have my wits about me, I may even stream some video live.
item.content:encoded: Oh, good question Stephen. If I have my wits about me, I may even stream some video live.

item.title: By: Stephen
item.dc:creator: Stephen
item.description: Quite a line up! Will the demos be recorded (video) for others to see?
item.content:encoded: Quite a line up! Will the demos be recorded (video) for others to see?

item.title: By: Conor O'Neill
item.dc:creator: Conor O'Neill
item.description: I'm afraid it's too late to sign-up, we are massively over-subscribed for the night. Keep an eye out for our next one early in the New Year.
item.content:encoded: I’m afraid it’s too late to sign-up, we are massively over-subscribed for the night. Keep an eye out for our next one early in the New Year.

item.title: By: Chisler
item.dc:creator: Chisler
item.description: Where can you sign up to attend?
item.content:encoded: Where can you sign up to attend?
